Class Reader

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileIO
      • Reader

  • public class Reader
extends FileIO
    This class reads the content of a file in a string using a file object.
    Author:
    Jonas Cosandey
    See Also:
    File, FileIO

      • readFile

        public static java.lang.String readFile(java.lang.String filePath)
        Static method which reads the content of a file into a string variable. Returns a string variable.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path to the file which should be read.
        Returns:
        String of the files content.
